column5: Anybody have any insight on Holly Lake? Looking for suggestions for our first fly in. We are looking at a trip thru NWO ourt of Fort Francis.

We are scheduled for a trip in June. We were told by someone who has fished this lake that this is not a great fishing lake. But-it could have been one of those periods. However, there appears to me numerous lakes which connect to Holly. The cabin is suppose to be excellent.
You picked a fantastic outfitter Vic, and Missy will take care of you, we are suppose to go end of May, but I think the virus will stop us from crossing into Canada. Let me know if you need any info.
